SEARCH
Package main.java.daos

Interface DAOInterface<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of elements this DAO operates on
All Known Implementing Classes:
BranchDAO, MenuDAO, OrderDAO, PaymentDAO, StaffDAO
public interface DAOInterface<T>
This interface defines the contract for Data Access Objects (DAOs) to interact with a data source. It includes methods for reading and saving data, getting elements, finding, updating, removing, and adding elements.
Since:
23-Apr-2024
Version:
1.2
Author:
SDDA Team 1

      Finds an element by its name.

      Returns:

      Updates an existing element with new data.
      Parameters:

      newElement - the new element with updated data
